content:
Hello ,everyone - it's first time here in Zulip space.
recently I built andriod apk successfully under Alec help and install apk is OK ,but run it failed, start it up then it flash white screen and quit immediately.
I guess it should be something wrong during build apk ....what's going on ?

I found the problem .
"java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: dlopen failed: "/data/app/..../lib/arm64/libgorp.so" is 32-bit

the libgorp.so file is 32bit ...not for 64bit ,how to build libgorp.so for 64bit ?
